description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.  The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Non-Metallic Hose Assembly
### Contract Reference: cb-597-60877978
#### Solicitation Number: W8482-253116/A

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for non-metallic hose assemblies to support ongoing military operations.

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada, Nova Scotia, British Columbia
* **Delivery Locations:** CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia; CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

## Items Required

* [Item 1] GSIN: N4720, NSN: 20-0017611, Quantity: 50 Units - Hose Assemblies, Non-Metallic (Flexible), Part No.: B-0000-04-SS-0360-O2, NCAGE: 08471, Senior Flexonics Canada LTD, Unit of Issue: AY
* [Item 2] GSIN: N4720, NSN: 20-0017611, Quantity: 25 Units - Hose Assemblies, Non-Metallic (Flexible), Part No.: B-0000-04-SS-0360-O2, NCAGE: 08471, Senior Flexonics Canada LTD, Unit of Issue: AY

## Important Notes

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars only.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* Requests for exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation will not be considered.
* The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian goods and/or services.

## Contact Information
For all inquiries, please contact:
Jean-Pierre Normandin
Telephone: (819) 939-3674
Email: [Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca](mailto:Jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca)

## Tender Documents

The tender notice and related documents are available on the Government of Canada's tendering website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

### Documents
* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/50586/rfp-w8482-253116-a-en.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default
